tossup_question: -   –  What photosynthetic pathway, named after its discoverers, is also known as the light-independent pathway?
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following would be the most likely explanation for hypothyroidism in a patient whose iodine level is normal?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Disproportionate production of T3 to T4
X) Hyposecretion of TSH
Y) Hypersecretion of TSH
Z) Hypersecretion of MSH
